text: The following lists events that happened during 2013 in Venezuela. ==Incumbents== *President: ** until March 5: Hugo Chavez ** March 5-April 19: Nicolás Maduro (interim) ** starting April 19: Nicolás Maduro *Vice President: ** until March 5: Nicolás Maduro ** March 5-April 19: vacant ** starting April 19: Jorge Arreaza ==Events== ===January=== ===February=== * February 7 - Increase the value of the Tax Unit 107 bolivars. ===March=== * March 5 — Venezuelan President Hugo Chávez dies aged 58, in the Military Hospital. ===April=== * April 14 – interim president Nicolás Maduro wins presidential election. ==Deaths== *May 23 - Luis Zuloaga, 90, baseball player ==References== Category:Years of the 21st century in Venezuela Venezuela Venezuela Category:2010s in Venezuela
title: 2013 in Venezuela
